jump_scares.spoiler: While a woman is hiding and trying to be quiet, her phone begins to loudly ring
Tom suddenly calls out to Owen while he’s texting, startling him
Something big is dropped into the water while Dodger is swimming
More stuff is suddenly dropped into the pool
Owen turns on the light, and with a loud string sound effect Tom is revealed to be sitting on a chair and staring at him
The killer suddenly walks by in the background
Owen walks away from the window and the killer takes a step forward to reveal he is outside
While the headmistress is talking, there is an abrupt very loud sound of someone opening the door that startles Owen
The killer walks by in the foreground
Mercedes wipes the steam off the mirror, revealing the killer in the background and causing her to scream
The killer suddenly grabs Lewis while he’s looking down at Owen from the railings
